title: Northern New England, USA: an invitation
brief_description: Northern New England is a place where, each year nature becomes the artist. This does not only apply to autumn, when nature splashes the mountains with every colour of the rainbow, but to the rest of the seasons as well, making Northern New England an all year round vacation paradise.
